Articles.Content: In the newest version released yesterday, did squad change the resolution(?) or something in the game? It seems more "HD" now.
They did update Unity, and maybe that's what you are seeing.

There's that README file in the game folder if you want to read release notes.

The new release comes with a new copy of settings.cfg file so it is possible it reverted to default settings depending on how it got installed on your PC.
Maybe you had it on the wrong resolution before, but this restored it to default.
